mapper.select: SELECT menu_id AS menuId, up_menu_id AS upMenuId, menu_nm AS menuName, menu_url AS menuUrl, sort_no AS sortNo, use_yn AS useYn, icon_cls AS iconCls, reg_dt AS regDt FROM doi_sys_menu WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sort_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doi_sys_menu ( menu_id, up_menu_id, menu_nm, menu_url, sort_no, use_yn, icon_cls, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{upMenuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{sortNo}, #{useYn}, #{iconCls}, GETDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE doi_sys_menu SET up_menu_id = #{upMenuId}, menu_nm = #{menuName}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, sort_no = #{sortNo}, use_yn = #{useYn}, icon_cls = #{iconCls} WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
